page.title: 18Transport
page.content: The M62 Motorway has played a vital role in the economic growth of Rochdale. There are three access points within the municipal borough. The highway is a vital link for Rochdale with the North West as well as being an important Transpennine Route. It is also well-used by commuters travelling easily to Manchester or Leeds. We undertook a survey in Balderstone Community School and found that 48 % of pupils' parents used the M62 regularly. Rochdale has a good rail service and is a major station on the Manchester to Leeds line.Trains operate,in both directions,approx.every 30 minutes,at peak times.
